title: Did not receive a capsule for leveling up.
body:
Went from Lvl 50 to 51 and did not receive one when I leveled up, is there an account bug going on?
{{sticker:sg-soraka}}

replies.body: No worries fam, poros got your back. I could line up the times on our end and saw this 51 capsule was missed, but you should have it now ^_^. make sure to refresh your client if you don't see it immediately!
Thanks mate!  You guys are always so responsive, I really appreciate it!
